content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can we help you today? Are you needing plumbing, electrical, or HVAC service?
I need a plumber as soon as possible, there’s a slow leak under my kitchen sink.
Thank you for letting me know. May I have your name to get started with scheduling your plumbing service?
Thank you, Richard. Could you please provide your address so I can check our team’s availability in your area?
Thank you! Let me verify your address so we can continue.
I’m sorry, I wasn’t able to verify your address. Could you please double-check or provide the full address, including ZIP code?
It’s 8921 Juniper Road, Springfield, really, that’s the address! Not sure what else you’re wanting.
I'm still having trouble with the address. Let me get a human team member to assist you and make sure we get this resolved quickly.
reason: AI unable to validate address after multiple attempts.

content: Hi Richard, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the trouble—sometimes our system is picky! Could you please confirm your ZIP code as well? Once you send it, we’ll get you scheduled right away.
Ah, okay. It’s 8921 Juniper Road, Springfield, 62703.
Thank you, Richard! Now that we have your full address, when is the best time for our plumber to come by? Please let me know your ideal day and time and we’ll fit you in as soon as possible.
